dict.acceptation: 推却，回绝；拒绝给（所需之物）；不愿，不肯；

sent.orig: All refuse has to be removed and got rid of because refuse contains disease-carrying germs.
sent.trans: 由于这些废污物带有细菌，因此要把它们统统运走，并加以处理。

sent.orig: They separate their garbage into wet refuse, dry refuse, bottles and cans and so on.
sent.trans: 她们把垃圾分类，湿的，乾的，空瓶罐等分放在塑胶袋里。

sent.orig: The dump was so full that it had to refuse more refuse.
sent.trans: 垃圾场都满了，不能再装更多垃圾。

sent.orig: In the refuse incineration process, the stability of incineration is always influenced heating value of refuse.
sent.trans: 在垃圾焚烧过程中，入炉垃圾热值的变化对燃烧的稳定性会产生很大的影响。

sent.orig: I've heard there' re two types of refuse: dry refuse and sewage.
sent.trans: 我听说废污物分两大类：干垃圾和污水。
